div.p: No. 606, unit 731, VPRS 3181 Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.1665in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.1665in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: See also M to E. FitzGibbon, 3 August 1864 (in this edition as 64-08-03a) and four letters M to the Corporation of Melbourne, 4 August 1864 (in this edition as 64-08-04a, 64-08-04b, 64-08-04c, and 64-08-04d).

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
Corporation of Melbourne
Corporation of Melbourne above THE GOVERNMENT OF VICTORIA, deleted.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: Amount required for the reimbursement of the expenditure defrayed by me, by means of the amount of £30.0.0 received on the 1864, as per accompanying Vouchers, viz.:—

p.seg: I certify that the foregoing account is true and correct in every particular.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; padding: 0in; border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1.5pt solid #000000;

div.p: Signature of Claimant Ferd Mueller Date 4/8/64

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
RECEIVED on the fourth Aug 18 64, from Esquire, Paymaster of the City Council the sum of thirty pounds pound
shilling pen in full payment of the above account.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Witness to the payment and signature —Ferd Mueller

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
